thread.title: Trinity House to co-host pre-Square Meal Venues and Events Show Champagne Breakfast 24th September
thread.title_full: Trinity House to co-host pre-Square Meal Venues and Events Show Champagne Breakfast 24th September

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Trinity House to co-host pre-Square Meal Venues and Events Show Champagne Breakfast 24th September
text:
Trinity House to co-host pre-Square Meal Venues and Events Show Champagne Breakfast 24th September Trinity House to co-host pre-Square Meal Venues and Events Show Champagne Breakfast 24th September Details Category: Venues & Events Created   11:45 Trinity House, the working home of the General Lighthouse Authority located on Tower Hill near Old Billingsgate, has teamed up with a select group of event industry leaders and specialist suppliers Clipper Events, preferred caterers Zafferano, Small Car BIG CITY (London’s classic Mini Cooper cars tour operator): ‘Havengore’ (the celebrated Port of London Authority’s former flagship vessel); the Fresh Flower Company and Great Hire (furniture and furnishings hire) to host a Champagne Breakfast on 24th September over the popular Square Meal Events and Venues Show at Old Billingsgate. 
The breakfast invitation is from 8.30am – 11am. Behind the distinctive iron railings in front of the House, Small Car BIG CITY will present a line-up of classic Mini Cooper cars – arguably one of Britain’s most instantly recognisable exports – for photograph opportunities for out-of-town attendees. The invitation to the fully co-hosted breakfast, prepared by award-winning caterers Zafferano, is extended to delegates and colleagues attending the Show but interested participants will need to register first with Karen Luard at This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. for confirmation of acceptance as place availability is limited. . One of London’s most historic buildings, Old Billingsgate is located on The Thames and is a five-minute walk from Trinity House, allowing delegates the option of a light breakfast with a glass of champagne before a leisurely walk to the site. The Venues and Events Show (http://www.venuesandevents.co.uk/), staged by publishers Square Meal, was attended by over 7,000 event industry professionals in 2014 and is a leading industry event. . Attendees wishing to accept the invitation extended by co-hosts Trinity House, Zafferano, Clipper Events, Small Car BIG CITY, ‘Havengore’, The Fresh Flower Company, and Great Hire should email as soon as possible to secure a pre-show breakfast place.
